name: Ninja Art: Ero Mist
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] derriba [AttackerHisOrHer] FaceMask y carteras [AttackerHisOrHer] labios como [AttackerHeOrShe] exhala una niebla rosada directamente en la cara de [TargetName], y como [TargetHeOrShe] innecesará involuntariamente a algunos, [TargetHeOrShe] comienza a sentirse caliente¡Y cachonda!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] pulls down [AttackerHisOrHer] facemask and purses [AttackerHisOrHer] lips as [AttackerHeOrShe] breathes out a pink mist directly into [TargetName]'s face, but [TargetHeOrShe] manages to hold [TargetHisOrHer] breath long enough for it to dissipate!
